item.title: Build a custom sign-in UI
item.description: Build a custom sign-in UI in your mobile app Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Build a custom sign-in UI in your mobile app: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/build-custom-ui-mobile/android/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: Integration guide An integration guide or coding guide illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code. It is similar to a how-to but the focus is more technical and geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.
